original:
Attacks using the energy of forbidden
temptation. 
★Confusion
translation:
Attacks using the energy of forbidden
temptation. 
★Confusion

original:
Showers the opponent in poisonous rain.
★Poison
translation:
Showers the opponent in poisonous rain.
★Poison

original:
Scatters poisonous powder at the opponent.
★Poison
translation:
Scatters poisonous powder at the opponent.
★Poison

original:
Glares at the opponent with eyes filled with
evil energy. 
★Paralysis
translation:
Glares at the opponent with eyes filled with
evil energy. 
★Paralysis

original:
Enchants the opponent with an alluring dance
and sweet scent. 
★Paralysis
translation:
Enchants the opponent with an alluring dance
and sweet scent. 
★Paralysis

original:
Engulfs the opponent in a water bubble,
causing them to fall asleep. 
★Sleep
translation:
Engulfs the opponent in a water bubble,
causing them to fall asleep. 
★Sleep

original:
Causes the opponent to fall asleep with a
resonating lullaby. 
★Stun ★Sleep
translation:
Causes the opponent to fall asleep with a
resonating lullaby. 
★Stun ★Sleep

original:
Showers allies with healing rain, restoring HP
and healing poison.
translation:
Showers allies with healing rain, restoring HP
and healing poison.

original:
Unleashes waves of holy energy, restoring
allies HP.
translation:
Unleashes waves of holy energy, restoring
allies HP.

original:
Calls upon the gods' healing light to restore
an ally's HP. 
★Stun
translation:
Calls upon the gods' healing light to restore
an ally's HP. 
★Stun

original:
Calls upon the healing power of machinery to
restore an ally's HP and heal poison.
translation:
Calls upon the healing power of machinery to
restore an ally's HP and heal poison.

original:
Calls upon the earth's healing energy to
restore an ally's HP and cure status
effects.
translation:
Calls upon the earth's healing energy to
restore an ally's HP and cure status
effects.

original:
Uses the power of light to distribute MP to
your allies.
translation:
Uses the power of light to distribute MP to
your allies.

original:
Calls upon the power of darkness to restore
an ally's MP.
translation:
Calls upon the power of darkness to restore
an ally's MP.

original:
Brings an ally into a loving embrace, reviving
it.
translation:
Brings an ally into a loving embrace, reviving
it.

original:
Summons the life force within nature's
oceans to call forth a tsunami and restore an
ally fully.
translation:
Summons the life force within nature's
oceans to call forth a tsunami and restore an
ally fully.

original:
Uses a hand engulfed in darkness to reach
into the otherworld and restore an ally fully.
translation:
Uses a hand engulfed in darkness to reach
into the otherworld and restore an ally fully.

original:
Restores an ally fully by giving it an electric
shock.
translation:
Restores an ally fully by giving it an electric
shock.

original:
Calls upon a healing breeze to restore an
ally's HP and cure poison.
translation:
Calls upon a healing breeze to restore an
ally's HP and cure poison.

original:
Calls upon the overflowing power of light to
cure an ally's status and restore HP.
translation:
Calls upon the overflowing power of light to
cure an ally's status and restore HP.

original:
Unleashes waves of light to restore an ally's
status and restore HP. 
★Stun
translation:
Unleashes waves of light to restore an ally's
status and restore HP. 
★Stun

original:
Calls upon the healing power of machinery to
cure an ally's status and restore HP.
translation:
Calls upon the healing power of machinery to
cure an ally's status and restore HP.

original:
Slashes at the opponent in the blink of an
eye using huge throwing stars.
translation:
Slashes at the opponent in the blink of an
eye using huge throwing stars.

original:
Slashes at the opponent swiftly with two holy
blades in a cross- shaped attack.
translation:
Slashes at the opponent swiftly with two holy
blades in a cross- shaped attack.

original:
Unleashes burning hot fire from one's mouth,
burning the opponent.
translation:
Unleashes burning hot fire from one's mouth,
burning the opponent.

original:
Seals the opponent for eternity in
space-time. 
★Confusion
translation:
Seals the opponent for eternity in
space-time. 
★Confusion

original:
Slashes at the opponent with its pair of razor
sharp ears.
translation:
Slashes at the opponent with its pair of razor
sharp ears.

original:
Emits a wave of light energy from its entire
body, eliminating everything. 
★Stun
translation:
Emits a wave of light energy from its entire
body, eliminating everything. 
★Stun

original:
Slams the opponent with a massive anchor,
slashing them in a cross shape.
translation:
Slams the opponent with a massive anchor,
slashing them in a cross shape.

original:
Melts everything with a rainbow- colored
hyperthermophile laser.
translation:
Melts everything with a rainbow- colored
hyperthermophile laser.

original:
Creates a massive explosion using the power
of fire, engulfing the enemy in fumes.
translation:
Creates a massive explosion using the power
of fire, engulfing the enemy in fumes.

original:
Slashes at the opponent with massive
claymores at the Speed of light.
translation:
Slashes at the opponent with massive
claymores at the Speed of light.

original:
Shoots powerful lasers from both hands,
burning everything.
translation:
Shoots powerful lasers from both hands,
burning everything.

original:
Unleashes a blizzard that freezes enemies
solid. 
★Stun
translation:
Unleashes a blizzard that freezes enemies
solid. 
★Stun

original:
Unleashes the power of flames, creating a
massive explosion engulfing the area. 
★Stun
translation:
Unleashes the power of flames, creating a
massive explosion engulfing the area. 
★Stun

original:
Spins around a heavy crane, bashing into the
opponent.
translation:
Spins around a heavy crane, bashing into the
opponent.

original:
Confines the opponent in a different
dimension of pure darkness, destroying them.
★Confusion
translation:
Confines the opponent in a different
dimension of pure darkness, destroying them.
★Confusion

original:
Uses the sword on its back to confuse the
opponent and launch a clever attack.
★Confusion
translation:
Uses the sword on its back to confuse the
opponent and launch a clever attack.
★Confusion

original:
Shoots arrows of darkness from the evil
eyes on its hands. 
★Death
translation:
Shoots arrows of darkness from the evil
eyes on its hands. 
★Death

original:
Unleashes a massive water current that
engulfs everything in its path. 
★Stun
translation:
Unleashes a massive water current that
engulfs everything in its path. 
★Stun

original:
Gathers all the negative energy and creates a
ball of darkness that destroys all. 
★Stun
translation:
Gathers all the negative energy and creates a
ball of darkness that destroys all. 
★Stun

original:
Summons an evil magician from hell to pass
down brutal justice upon the opponent.
★Death
translation:
Summons an evil magician from hell to pass
down brutal justice upon the opponent.
★Death

original:
Gathers the power of grudges and burns all
with burning hot flames.
translation:
Gathers the power of grudges and burns all
with burning hot flames.

original:
Unleashes a dark gas that eats away at and
destroys data. 
★Poison
translation:
Unleashes a dark gas that eats away at and
destroys data. 
★Poison

original:
Using its ultimate wisdom, it calculates the
coordinates of the spirit world and imprisons
the opponent there. ★Confusion
translation:
Using its ultimate wisdom, it calculates the
coordinates of the spirit world and imprisons
the opponent there. ★Confusion

original:
Fires a massive ball of dark energy at the
opponent, destroying all in its path.
translation:
Fires a massive ball of dark energy at the
opponent, destroying all in its path.

original:
Gathers dark energy within the lance in its
right hand and slashes the opponent in the
blink of an eye. ★Death
translation:
Gathers dark energy within the lance in its
right hand and slashes the opponent in the
blink of an eye. ★Death

original:
Shoots at the opponent twice using its
beloved shotgun, Berenjena.
translation:
Shoots at the opponent twice using its
beloved shotgun, Berenjena.

original:
Uses the power of an evil god to destroy the
flow of time and rebuild it. 
★Stun ★Paralysis
translation:
Uses the power of an evil god to destroy the
flow of time and rebuild it. 
★Stun ★Paralysis

original:
Shoots flames of hell from both its shoulders
at the opponent, burning everything.
translation:
Shoots flames of hell from both its shoulders
at the opponent, burning everything.
